description: Given a financial earnings call press release and metric valyes, generate a valuation of the share price

parameters.name: TargetPrice
parameters.description: Canaccord's estimate for the target price of the stock

parameters.name: DividendperShare
parameters.description: Represents the consensus estimate of the total dividends per share declared including extra dividends for the primary share class of the company

parameters.name: DividendYield
parameters.description: Calculated by dividing the estimated Dividends Per Share by the Price of a security.

parameters.name: EVSales
parameters.description: EV/Sales - Calculated by dividing the EV by the estimated Sale of a security.

parameters.name: EVGrossProfit
parameters.description: EV/GrossProfit - Calculated by dividing the EV by the Gross Margin of a security.

parameters.name: EVEBITDA
parameters.description: EV/EBITDA - Calculated by dividing the EV by the EBITDA of a security.

parameters.name: PE
parameters.description: P/E - Calculated by dividing the Price by the estimated EPS of a security.

parameters.name: PFCF
parameters.description: P/FCF - Calculated by dividing the Price by the estimated Free Cash Flow Per Share of a security.

parameters.name: FCFYield
parameters.description: FCF Yield - Calculated by dividing the estimated Free Cash Flow (FCF) by the Market Capitalization of a security.
